Review Name: Fair Review Description: It's ok but not so good, previously I had a Samsung AC , which I returned due to internal damage , But when it was runing , you can't believe that , in 24'C your time will chilled and you have to wear a blancket , But in this voltas AC, if you run above 20'C your all body become wey with swet, Now you can emeginne what tha power consumption of your hone if you Run below 20'C Your bill will be above 3000/- month for sure It's says that 832 unit per year , but actually it take 400 unit per month
